lines.text: We of the fourth estate realize that time and tide wait for no homo sapiens.
Gabe isn't a bad kid. He's just going through that adolescent phrase in life; he hasn't learned to extinguish right from wrong.
Sach is what might be classed as a very demonstrative boy. Also slightly psychiatrical.
Just order anything you want and put it on my bill. I'll, uh, charge it off to experience.
